name: CuVRball
description: CuVRball is an online multiplayer action game that is easy to learn and fun to play. Shoot explosives, score goals, and dazzle your opponents with your awesomeness. Give the free trial a go and see if you like it.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
